name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Webplayer Hotkeys - Shortcuts for web players

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assign hotkeys to play/pause, and switch music. Works with Spotify, Deezer, SoundCloud, Youtube and Youtube Music.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension that assigns hotkeys and shortcuts to play/pause, and to switch music (next and previous). If no player is currently opened, it fires up Spotify.

If there is more player tabs than one, it follows this order of priority: Spotify > Deezer > SoundCloud > Youtube

Works with:

• Spotify
• Deezer
• SoundCloud
• Youtube
